<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="configuration-management-0200">
            <when>
                <file filename="application{profile}.{extension}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Application properties file detected">
                    <description>Application properties file detected</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Application Properties File</technology-tag>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
